file_content.text: Commander + Theron = alive!
We're not out of this just yet.
Arcann = new friend?
I'm as surprised as you, buddy.
Save the greetings. Let's get out of here alive.
Mission accomplished. Sort of.
Vaylin survived, but she's hated by half of Zakuul.
And Indo escaped with the rebels to fight another day, minus the ones we lost in combat.
You're leaving out the best part. I killed Arcann, and the whole galaxy watched.
And Indo escaped with the rebels. They even gained a few recruits from the civilians they rescued.
More importantly, the former emperor now works for us.
I sensed a change in him. But are we sure we can trust the man who tried to kill you? Multiple times?
Don't forget freezing you in carbonite for five years.
Revenge consumed me for too long. But you saved my mother, and for that I'm in your debt.
Senya believed in your ability to change. And she was right.
She knew you weren't lost.
But your work is not complete. My sister's reign of destruction is far from over.
As long as I hold the key to her conditioning, Vaylin is muzzled.
We still have the advantage.
She won't allow this for long.
Like any cornered predator...
...she will strike back.
We are ready for your arrival.
Father's leash has choked me long enough. It's time I break free.
When you struck him down, I sensed something. As if his life force was flowing into you...
It happened once before... when Valkorion died.
My son cannot travel between hosts. You merely absorbed his strength. His spirit was obliterated.
...my last surviving child.
Give me a heads up the next time I'm about to consume one of your offspring.
Warn me next time.
Arcann's spirit can haunt Odessen for all I care. What matters is that I rid the galaxy of a dangerous tyrant.
Enough with the spirit talk.
I will find Vaylin, and I will end her. She can't hide from me.
I'll hunt her down.
You know her better than anyone. What's her next move?
Tell me what she's planning.
You belong to the Alliance now. I trust you'll remember your place.
And don't forget it.
The Alliance won't rush to trust a former enemy. You'll have to earn it.
Prove we can trust you.
You still control her conditioning. That gives us the advantage.
The power you hold over her conditioning. She won't allow it to continue.
You will experience it once more, when you defeat Vaylin...
Your work is not complete. You must take the Eternal Throne, and defeat Vaylin...
I've consumed my share of spirits over the years. This felt no different.
I once led an army of Force ghosts to conquer my enemies. Attempt the same against me, and you will regret it.
You can't fool me.
I've dealt with enough Force users to see through your mystical mumbo jumbo.
Sounds like a lie to me.
I don't feel Arcann's presence, but that doesn't mean I trust you.
I'm still not convinced.
Darth Thanaton underestimated you, but I will not. Together we will take the Eternal Throne, and defeat Vaylin...
Skepticism is healthy. It will aid your ascension to the Eternal Throne, and your defeat of Vaylin...
She was right about you, as well. I finally see it.
I intend to prove my loyalty many times over.
I suspect you won't allow me to forget it.
CUT
